TEXT.TITLE: ENSECO <NCCO.O> GETS EPA CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Enseco Inc said it has received 4,600,000 dlrs in contract from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency to test samples in support of the Superfund program over a 30-month period and to perform special analytical services. Reuter
